name: gimme all the cables toque
notes:
****update****
if you have downloaded this pattern already please make sure you have the latest version 5 january 24, 2019. latest version has an adjustment to row 24.

this pattern is chuck full of cables, 9 to be exact! 

**fit**
the fit is for an adult, my head is 23" circumference and this toque fits perfectly!

**skill level**
you will need to know how to:
knit 
purl
cf6 - cable front knitting
kfb knit front back (an increase stitch)
k2tog - knit two together

**yarn suggestion**
this pattern was written using a super bulky weight yarn. i use lion brand wool ease thick and quick

**supplies needed**
needles	us 13/9mm – 16” circular knitting needles
us 13/9mm dpn’s 
(double pointed needles)
stitch markers
cable needle
yarn needle 
scissors
